server.net

Class StaticPacketBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.net.StaticPacketBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketBuilder

    public class StaticPacketBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacketBuilder
    A mutable sequence of bytes used to construct the immutable Packet objects. By default, methods use big endian byte ordering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaticPacketBuilder()
      Constructs a packet builder with no data and an initial capacity of DEFAULT_SIZE.
      StaticPacketBuilder(int capacity)
      Constructs a packet builder with no data and an initial capacity of capacity.

        public StaticPacketBuilder setBare(boolean bare)
        Sets this packet as bare. A bare packet will contain only the payload data, rather than having the standard packet header prepended.
        Parameters:
        bare - Whether this packet is to be sent bare

        public StaticPacketBuilder addBytes(byte[] data)
        Adds the contents of byte array data to the packet. The size of this packet will grow by the length of the provided array.
        Parameters:
        data - The bytes to add to this packet
        Returns:
        A reference to this object

      • addBytes

        public StaticPacketBuilder addBytes(byte[] data,
                           int offset,
                           int len)
        Adds the contents of byte array data, starting at index offset. The size of this packet will grow by len bytes.
        Parameters:
        data - The bytes to add to this packet
        offset - The index of the first byte to append
        len - The number of bytes to append
        Returns:
        A reference to this object
